mapper.insert: INSERT experience ( ceo_id, address_id, experience_name, experience_content, experience_price, experience_startdate, experience_enddate, experience_person, experience_detailed_address, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{ceoId}, #{addressId}, #{experienceName}, #{experienceContent}, #{experiencePrice}, #{experienceStartdate}, #{experienceEnddate}, #{experiencePerson}, #{experienceDetailedAddress}, now(), now() )
